name: Ext_R5_RequestOrchestration_ac_definition
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.RequestOrchestration.action.definition[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents RequestOrchestration.action.definition[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RequestOrchestration|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Description of the activity to be performed
element.definition: A reference to an ActivityDefinition that describes the action to be taken in detail, a PlanDefinition that describes a series of actions to be taken, a Questionnaire that should be filled out, a SpecimenDefinition describing a specimen to be collected, or an ObservationDefinition that specifies what observation should be captured.
element.comment: `RequestOrchestration.action.definition[x]` has no related element in R4B:RequestGroup

element.short: Description of the activity to be performed
element.definition: A reference to an ActivityDefinition that describes the action to be taken in detail, a PlanDefinition that describes a series of actions to be taken, a Questionnaire that should be filled out, a SpecimenDefinition describing a specimen to be collected, or an ObservationDefinition that specifies what observation should be captured.
element.comment: `RequestOrchestration.action.definition[x]` has no related element in R4B:RequestGroup
